  • Constructor Details

    • MatterBuilder

      public MatterBuilder()
      Create a new MatterBuilder, without any fields set

  • Method Details

    • uiReadyMatter

      public static MatterBuilder uiReadyMatter()
      Create a new MatterBuilder with the following fields set:
      • A unique name
      • A claim; uses the specified claim if called from within withMatter() on a ClaimBuilder, or if onClaim is called. Otherwise creates a new UI ready personal auto claim
      • Assigment fields set to the same values as those on the claim
      Returns:
      the new builder

    • uiReadyMatter

      public static MatterBuilder uiReadyMatter(Claim claim)
      Create a new MatterBuilder with the following fields set:
      • A unique name
      • A claim, as specified by the claim parameter
      • Assigment fields set to the same values as those on the claim
      Parameters:
      claim - the matter's claim; if null ClaimBuilder.uiReadyAuto() will be used to generate a new claim
      Returns:
      the new builder

    • uiReadyMatter

      public static MatterBuilder uiReadyMatter(ValueGenerator<? extends Claim> claim)
      Create a new MatterBuilder with the following fields set:
      • A unique name
      • A claim, as specified by the claim parameter
      • Assigment fields set to the same values as those on the claim
      Parameters:
      claim - a value generator that will return a claim; if null ClaimBuilder.uiReadyAuto() will be used to generate a new claim
      Returns:
      the new builder

    • withAssignedQueue

      public MatterBuilder withAssignedQueue(AssignableQueue assignedQueue)
      Sets the either the Queue to which this entity is assigned (if AssignmentStatus is 'assigned'), the Queue to which the system suggests assignment (if AssignmentStatus is 'manual'), or null if none assigned. Only one of AssignedUserID or AssignedQueueID should be non null.
      Parameters:
      assignedQueue - the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withAssignedQueue

      public MatterBuilder withAssignedQueue(ValueGenerator<? extends AssignableQueue> assignedQueue)
      Sets the either the Queue to which this entity is assigned (if AssignmentStatus is 'assigned'), the Queue to which the system suggests assignment (if AssignmentStatus is 'manual'), or null if none assigned. Only one of AssignedUserID or AssignedQueueID should be non null.
      Parameters:
      assignedQueue - a value generator that will return the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public MatterBuilder unassigned()

    • assignedTo

      public MatterBuilder assignedTo(String userName)
      Sets the matter's assigned user, group and assignment status by looking up an existing user then setting the assigned user to that user, the assigned group to the user's group and the assignment status to "assigned". If the user is in multiple groups then the groups are sorted alphabetically by name and the first group is used.
      Parameters:
      userName - the name of the desired assigned user
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withContactInRole

      public MatterBuilder withContactInRole(ValueGenerator<? extends Contact> contactBuilder, ContactRole role)
      Adds a contact to the matter with the given role. If the role is exclusive this will replace any current value for that role, otherwise it will add another contact with the given role
      Parameters:
      contactBuilder - a generator that will return the contact to be added
      role - the role for the contact
      Returns:
      the modified builder
